snippet.title: SAMURAI MAIDEN - 2nd Trailer
snippet.description:
Beautiful as a cherry blossom, deadly as a samurai!
D3PUBLISHER's brand-new Girls Sword-fighting Action game "SAMURAI MAIDEN"
Coming December 8th, 2022 for #PS5 #PS4 #NintendoSwitch & #Steam!

In this video, we present a detailed view of Japan's long and venerable history to those viewers around the world with an interest in our country.
Today's topic is the Sengoku period. And here to help us is a Japanese high school student, Tsumugi Tamaori. As she has had the invaluable experience of actually visiting the Sengoku period, we invited her to assist with today's video.

■SPEC
　Title: SAMURAI MAIDEN
　Platforms: PlayStation®5/PlayStation®4*/Nintendo Switch/Steam
　　　　　  *The PS4 version can be upgraded to the PS5 version for free.
　Release Date: December 8th, 2022
　Genre: Girls Sword-fighting Action
　# of Player: 1
　Developer: SHADE Inc.
　Voice Actors: Yuki Yomichi (Tsumugi Tamaori) / Miku Ito (Iyo) / Sumire Uesaka (Hagane) / Miyu Tomita (Komimi) / Shuka Saito (Shingen Takeda) / Emi Uema (Kenshin Uesugi) / Takaya Kuroda (Nobunaga Oda) etc.
　Main Character Design: Miwano Rag
　Publisher: D3PUBLISHER Inc.

Follow the latest news on:
■Official Website
　https://www.d3p.co.jp/s_maiden/

■Twitter
　https://twitter.com/s_maiden_en

■Instagram
　https://www.instagram.com/s_maiden_en/


©2022 SHADE Inc. ©2022 D3PUBLISHER
